== Synopsis ==
{{quote|
Discover all there is to know about the past year of ''Minecraft'' in this exciting annual. Stuffed to the brim with updates, activities, step-by-step builds and tips and tricks for the game, this book is a must-have for any minecrafter.

Plus discover a blocky brownie recipe, awesome buillds and [[survival]] challenges for you to complete in-game!|Book description<ref>[https://www.amazon.co.uk/Minecraft-Annual-2025-Mojang-AB/dp/0008615675/ Minecraft Annual 2025: The new official fully illustrated annual - Amazon]</ref>}}
